evidence: This allows for electronic focusing and beam steering in both dimensions

concepts.term: 2D phased array operates the same way as the 1D version

evidence: The operation of a two-dimensional array. The black squares represent the individual crystals in the array. (Left) Two-dimensional focusing can be achieved using appropriate time delays applied symmetrically with respect to the individual elements of the array. (Right) Electronic beam steering can be performed in two dimensions.
(Right) Electronic beam steering can be performed in two dimensions.
triples.o: electronic beam steering in two dimensions
